CalyxOS Local Repository

This is a repository of apps to be used with CalyxOS. It is installed to the system partition, and meant to be used to initially install apps when offline. It contains a limited number of applications deemed suitable for inclusion with CalyxOS.

Currently it serves 16 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

file:///product/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
3C 2D 9F 24 A4 01 E5 0B D3 FB EB F3 A9 E0 55 6A 52 C3 DE CB 77 B8 15 49 6C B9 99 EB F8 43 F1 E0
